biotools.summary: ACEP is a deep learning model for high-throughput antibacterial peptide recognition. By loading a pre-trained model, the software can be deployed on a common computer to perform antimicrobial peptide recognition, important motif discovery, and visualization analysis. Both the peptide sequences and PSSM profiles need to be input the model.
